targets.query: SELECT last("value") * -1 + 100 FROM "[[DS]]"."cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "mode" = 'idle' AND "cpu" = 'system' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ram" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."disk_space" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'received' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'system') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "mode" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."load" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "avg" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")  FROM "[[DS]]"."ctxt_switches" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."processes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."mem_committed" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."io" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "operation" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."disk_space" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."disk_inodes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."disk_backlog" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."disk_util" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."net_drops" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ipv4_errors" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ipv4_packets" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ipv4_errors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ipv4_tcpsock" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ipv4_tcphandshake" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ipv4_tcperrors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ipv4_udppackets" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "type" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."apps_cpu" WHERE "app" = 'openio' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."apps_preads" WHERE "app" = 'openio' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT (sum("value") * -1) FROM "[[DS]]"."apps_pwrites" WHERE "app" = 'openio' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."apps_files" WHERE "app" = 'openio' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."apps_mem" WHERE "app" = 'openio' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."apps_processes" WHERE "app" = 'openio' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."apps_threads" WHERE "app" = 'openio' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."apps_sockets" WHERE "app" = 'openio' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_score" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "service_type", "namespace" fill(null)

SELECT (sum("value") * -1) FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_bandwidth" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" =~ /bytes_sent|sent/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype","namespace" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_response_time" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype", "namespace", "type" fill(null)

SELECT sum("value")/($__interval_ms / 10000) FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_response_codes" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND ("type" = '5xx'  OR "type" = '4xx') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype","namespace", "type" fill(null)

SELECT sum(value) FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_response_codes" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype","namespace", "type" fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_http_method" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype","namespace", "type" fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_beanstalkd_tubes" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" =~ /^current.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace", "tube", "type" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_beanstalkd_tubes" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'total_jobs' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace", "type", "tube", "host" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_approximate_data_size" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_pending_syncs" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_avg_latency" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_avg_latency" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)

SELECT max("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_outstanding_requests" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)
